short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Daily reminder for people while they are searching the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides a custom search bar with Results by Microsoft Bing on the New Tab page.

This extension provides a new tab with inspirational quotes and the local time.
The quotes are taken from an external source :  https://www.brainyquote.com/topics/inspirational-quotes.

This tool contains links to external websites that are not provided or maintained by or in any way affiliated with our company or this product. Please note that our company or this tool does not guarantee the accuracy, relevance, timeliness, or completeness of any information on these external websites. For more information visit our Terms of Use page listed below.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Be Inspired Chrome extension and setting Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
 
Uninstall Instructions: https://www.beinspiredtab.com/uninstall.html
EULA/Terms of Use - https://www.beinspiredtab.com/terms.html
Privacy Policy - https://www.beinspiredtab.com/policy.html
Contact Us: http://www.beinspiredtab.com/terms.html#terms-contact

To remove our extension from Google Chrome:
 
1) Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings".
3) In the menu that appears click on "Extensions".
4) From the list of installed Extensions, find the name of the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall.
5) Click on the trash can icon to the right of "Enable" (for the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall).
6) Close your browser completely and reopen it. Our toolbar extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
